item.title: These stocks posting earnings next week have a history of topping expectations
item.description: Major names like Chipotle Mexican Grill and Mondelez International are slated to post quarterly earnings next week.

item.title: Software stocks enter bear market on AI disruption fear with ServiceNow plunging 10%
item.description: The iShares Expanded Tech-Software Sector ETF is on pace for its biggest one-day decline since April 4 during the tariff-triggered downturn.

item.title: These bonds trounced cash in 2025, and they could still offer solid returns for investors

item.title: Russia and China control a key metal for military use. This company is helping the U.S. find a solution
